## Room.joinRoom() method

加入指定房间, 成功则可使用 this.currRoomInfo 可获取当前所在的房间信息

**Signature:**

```typescript
joinRoom(playerPara: IPlayerInfoPara, joinRoomPara: IJoinRoomPara): Promise<IResult<IRoomInfo>>;
```
